metadata.title: CVE-2016-2175 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache PDFBox before 1.8.12 and 2.x before 2.0.1 does not properlyinitialize the XML parsers, which allows context-dependent attackers toconduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks via a crafted PDF.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
